GENERAL PASSENGER & FARES INFORMATION
AIRCRAFT - SFO operates Sikorsky S-61N Twin-Jet, 26 passen-
ger amphibious turbocopters; S-62A 10 passenger Jet powered
turbocopters & Westland SRN-5, 15 passenger radar equipped,
jet powered Hovercraft.
AIRLINE CODES -The official code for SFO Helicopter Airlines
is "OH." Other codes are:
br-berkeley ne oon
JMC — Marin Heliport
JOK —Oakland Heliport
JCA — Contra Costa Heliport
PAO — Palo Alto Airport
SJC - San Jose Airport
OAK — Metropolitan Oakland International Airport
SFO — San Francisco International Airport
JFO — Downtown San Francisco
BAGGAGE -Free Allowance — Domestic (USA & Canada) —40
pounds; International -b pounds. Baggage in excess of the
above free allowance will be charged at published tariff rates.
CHECK-IN - Passengers should check in at the boarding gate at
least 10 minutes prior to scheduled departure time, or the pas-
serizers reservaton a ve canceled and made avalade o
someone else.
CONDITION OF CARRIAGE -Tariff rules provide that no person
may be boarded whose conduct, status, age, or mental or phys-
ical condition is such as to render such person incapable of
caring for himself without assistance from others. Current tariffs
orouble soecion de avalade at a oices ororo nel
copter Airlines. All schedules and information published in this
timetable are subiect to change without prior notice. SFO Heli
copter Airlines may also alter or cancel any of the schedules
published herein without first giving notice.

INTERNATIONAL FLIGHTS: Free service between Oakland and San Francisco airport on connecting flights of
following airlines: Air France, BOAC, Japan Air Lines, Lufthansa, Pan American, Qantas, Sabena and TWA.
CONNECTING TIMES— Domestic -from helicopter to ALL: 20
minutes. To helicopter from all except TWA: 30 minutes. To hel-
icopter from TWA: 20 minutes. International -45 minutes.
HELICOPTER CARRIERS- We suggest our passengers use the
screduled mercooter services ot

EUROPEAN AIRWAYS CORP., CHICAGO HELICOPTER AIRWAYS,
ANGELES AIRWAYS, INC.
PAKISTAN INTERNATIONAL AIRLINES, and SABENA
BELGIAN WORLD AIRLINES.
SCHEDULES — Schedules show the time at which flights may be
expected to arrive or depart, but SFO Helicopter Airlines will
not be responsible for consequences arising from delays or
from errors in the printed schedule. Times shown are subject to
change without notice. SFO Schedules are included in the San
Francisco listing of the North American Quick Reference Edition
(QRE) of the Official Airline Guide (OAG), in table 325 of the
vAG and In table 1/00 or the Abe world Airways Guide.
TICKETING —To take advantage of the low joint fares, a sepa-
rate flight coupon for the helicopter leg of the trip must be
included in the connecting airline ticket.
RESERVATIONS - Reservations may be made at any airline
ticket or reservation orice, any travel agency or by calling stu
Helicopter Airlines direct.
COURTESY BUS —Operated by SFO Helicopter. Available at no
charge at San Francisco Airport for passengers transferring be-
tween central and south terminals.
CHILDREN'S FARES — One child under 2 years of age not occu-
pying a seat and accompanied by an adult fare paying passen-
ger may be carried free. Children between 2 and 12 years of age
dre caree at na are

points Thess ariaise naily to both intra state and interstate

CREDIT CARDS- SFO Helicopter Airlines honors the American
Express, BankAmericard, Diner's, Universal Air Travel Plan and
the SFO Helicopter Airlines credit cards.
EXCURSION FARE —A special same-day round trip excursion
fare via anv scheduled flight is available for onlv $6.00 blus tax.
Advance reservations are not permitted under this fare. You get
a sightseeing trip with a panoramic view of the beautiful San
Francisco bay area. It's great for taking photographs!
FAMILY PLAN —SFO Helicopter Airlines Family Plan is available
va any tight trom 1<.v0 Noon Monday througn
Friday.
The head of the family pays one full fare, the spouse
and or children 12 through 21 years of age accompanying the
head of the family on the same flight travel for each 75% of
the full adult one way fare.
GROUP FARES — Special group fares for 10 or more persons are
available via any regularly scheduled flights between most points
on the SFO Helicopter Airlines system. Two children between
< and 1< years or age will de considered as one person in deter-
mining the size of the group.
MILITARY FARES — Military personnel on furlough or leave trav-
ems at their own expense in untormaan
possession oT
authorized military leave papers travel for each 50% of the full
adult one way fare
